title: Finance & Business Operations Coordinator
job_overview:
Full-Time · Remote · $800/month · PH-Based
? For the detail-minded, heart-led **woman** ready to grow with a mission-driven company

???? Who We Are
We’re building a movement — one that brings order to chaos, clarity to overwhelm, and healing to the unseen.

Our brand supports systems of transformation — from endometriosis advocacy (FindHerPain™), to digital organizing (Easy Organization™), to the exploration of sound, frequency, and the feminine blueprint through ethical AI (The Kailos Axis™).

Behind every product, course, and idea is a deeply personal story, and a vision to make life better — spiritually, practically, and financially.

???? Who You Are
You’re not just looking for a job. You want to be part of something that feels meaningful. You believe that details matter, structure creates safety, and money is a sacred flow. You’re organized, proactive, and intuitive — the kind of woman who double-checks the numbers, color-codes the spreadsheet, and reminds the founder when it’s time to pay the taxes *before* she asks. You might not know everything yet, but you're hungry to learn. You want to grow with a brand that uplifts women, redefines leadership, and balances soul with systems.

???? Your Role

As our Finance & Business Operations Coordinator, you’ll be the keeper of our numbers, our rhythm, and our internal clarity.

You will:
- Track weekly business expenses across accounts
- Maintain clear financial records in Notion & Drive
- Send invoices, follow payments, and manage receipts
- Prepare simple, beautiful monthly reports
- Monitor our budgets and alert us to red flags
- Support us in applying for grants and reporting
- Help manage permissions, passwords, and systems related to finance
- Protect our business like it’s your own

???? Tools You’ll Use
- Google Sheets, Notion
- Wave, QuickBooks, or similar
- Stripe, PayPal, Gusto (training provided)
- ClickUp
- Google Workspace
- Airtable or similar (we’ll teach you)

? What We Offer
- ???? $800/month, full-time (40 hrs/week)
- ???? 13th month bonus
- ???? Paid rest days (1 per month to start)
- ???? Growth track to $1,000/mo and beyond
- ???? Mentorship, trust, and sacred space to grow
- ???? A real seat at the table of something extraordinary

???? How to Apply
Send the following to Upgrade to see actual info

1. A short message from the heart: Who are you and what draws you to this role?
2. Your resume or portfolio of financial/admin work
3. A sample spreadsheet or report (if you have one)
4. One idea you have to help women-led businesses stay financially strong
